sentence.Network_en: He would acknowledge with perfect ingenuousness that his concession had been attended with such partial good.
sentence.Network_cn: 他坦率地承认,由于他让步的结果,招来不少坏处.

auth_sentence.content: What preserves him from ingenuousness is the mulish will of a onetime enfant terrible.
auth_sentence.res_content: What preserves him from ingenuousness is the mulish will of a onetime enfant terrible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What preserves him from ingenuousness is the mulish will of a onetime enfant terrible.

auth_sentence.content: She can make ingenuousness seem noble, by expressing a powerful will to find the best in life.
auth_sentence.res_content: She can make ingenuousness seem noble, by expressing a powerful will to find the best in life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She can make ingenuousness seem noble, by expressing a powerful will to find the best in life.

auth_sentence.content: The two young men were very different; Graham, with his rawboned amiability, was the essence of country-boy ingenuousness.
auth_sentence.res_content: The two young men were very different; Graham, with his rawboned amiability, was the essence of country-boy ingenuousness.
